seo.title: Veo 3.1 First/Last ‚Äì Bridge Any Two Frames with Native Audio
seo.description: Upload a starting frame and an ending frame, write a brief, and let Veo 3.1 animate the motion in-between. Optional audio, 4‚Äì8 second clips, pay-as-you-go.

hero.title: Veo 3.1 First/Last ‚Äì Seamless Bridges Between Keyframes
hero.intro: Pick two still frames‚Äîthe opening and closing beat‚Äîthen let Veo 3.1 or Veo 3.1 Fast animate the transition. Keep wardrobe, lighting, and framing locked while the engine interpolates motion, adds camera moves, and optionally layers in native audio.

overview: Veo 3.1 First/Last turns static frames into polished motion. Upload the bookends of your shot, describe the action, and choose Standard (Veo 3.1) for maximum fidelity or Fast (Veo 3.1 Fast) for cheaper previews. Each run produces up to eight seconds with optional native audio and supports 9:16, 16:9, or square outputs.

bestUseCases.title: Best use cases
items: Bridge storyboards or previz stills into short hero clips
Replace expensive pickup shots with matched transitions
Add motion between key art variations for product launches
Iterate fast with Fast mode, then upgrade to Standard for final delivery

technicalOverview.label: Inputs
technicalOverview.body: Two frames (start + end) plus a descriptive prompt

technicalOverview.label: Durations
technicalOverview.body: 4s, 6s, or 8s clips with native audio toggle

technicalOverview.label: Modes
technicalOverview.body: Standard (Veo 3.1) for fidelity, Fast (Veo 3.1 Fast) for rapid iteration

promptStructure.title: Prompt structure
promptStructure.quote: ‚ÄúStart frame: calm living room set. End frame: same scene with neon lighting as the host lifts a product. Bridge with a whip-pan and upbeat VO: ‚ÄòPowered by Veo 3.1 First/Last.‚Äô‚Äù
steps: What changes between the first and last frame (lighting, poses, props)
Camera motion or FX (whip-pan, dolly-in, rack focus)
Audio notes (VO script, ambience, music cues)

tips.title: Tips & tricks
items: üì∑ Use consistent resolution/aspect in both frames for best alignment
üéöÔ∏è Mention how quickly you want to reach the ending pose
üéß Call out audio beats even if you plan to mute later
‚ö° Draft in Fast mode, finalize in Standard without rewriting prompts

prompts.title: Launch sequence bridge
prompts.prompt: First frame: product on podium, cool lighting. Last frame: same scene but warm spotlight and confetti. Animate a dramatic dolly and reveal voice-over: ‚ÄúPresenting Aurora X.‚Äù

faqs.q: What if my frames differ in aspect ratio?
faqs.a: Upload frames cropped to the target ratio when possible. Otherwise, Veo auto-crops to preserve the most important subjects.
Yes. Export without audio (generate_audio=false) for cheaper runs, or keep the native mix and mute it during editing.

pricingNotes: Live wallet pricing updates inside Generate. Switch between Standard and Fast modes before you run.
